p: The detailed characterisation of intrinsic physicochemical and extrinsic properties of the NBMs and medicinal products made thereof is essential to understand and predict their emissions/release and exposure, and to interpret the available toxicological data [ 33]. The European Chemicals Agency (ECHA) provided a recommended list of nanomaterial properties that should be measured as part of a Chemical Safety Assessment for nanomaterials [ 34] and the characterisation methods to measure physicochemical properties of manufactured nanomaterials [ 35] are generally applicable also to NBMs used in medicine.
